      • deleteProduct

        public void deleteProduct(java.lang.String pdt_product,
                          java.lang.String nickname)
        This method deletes a product of a Seller. It deletes The product from the seller Products List and then deletes the product from the database. The nickname/product name argument specifies the seller/product and must be a String.
        Specified by:
        deleteProduct in class AbstractFactoryProduct
        Parameters:
        product - name (a String giving the name of the Product) nickname (a String giving the nickname of the Seller)

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct(java.lang.String nickname,
                       java.lang.String pdt_name,
                       java.lang.Integer pdt_quantity,
                       java.lang.Integer pdt_price,
                       java.lang.String pdt_briefDesc,
                       java.lang.String pdt_longDesc)
        This method adds a product of a Seller. It adds The product into the seller Products List and adds the product in the database. The nickname/product name argument specifies the seller/product and must be a String.
        Specified by:
        addProduct in class AbstractFactoryProduct
        Parameters:
        nickname - (a String giving the nickname of the Seller), product name (a String giving the name of the Product), product quantity (a Integer giving the quantity of the Product), product price (a Integer giving the price of the Product), product brief description (a String giving the brief description of the Product), product long description (a String giving the long description of the Product)
